imdb.title: Ushio & Tora
imdb.plot: Ushio Aotsuki unknowingly releases demonic energy that attracts monsters. The demon Tora, makes him an offer. He will help fight the monsters if Ushio removes the legendary Beast Spear that trapped him in Ushio's basement for 500 ...

episodes.title: The Wind Blows
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora are forgotten by the Yokais and humans under the influence of "Hakumen no Mono"'s Minions.

episodes.title: I Won't Lose Anyone Else
episodes.plot: Yôkais learned the prophecy that the Beast Spear will break into pieces, so they decided that they offer Mayuko as a sacrifice like Jie Mei to create a new spear.

episodes.title: The Night of the Crescent Moon
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora meets Hyou again. Hyou didn't lose his memory about Ushio, because he has a magical crystal ball instead of lost his right eye. They fight against a tiger-like yôkai Guren which is a carbon copy of Tora.

episodes.title: The Journey of No Return
episodes.plot: An imposter of Jie Mei visits commander Atsuzawa of the Anti-Hakumen Special Operations Unit in JSDF. She asks him for help. Meanwhile, Nagare attacks Ushio and Tora suddenly.

episodes.title: To the Sea of Chaos
episodes.plot: Atsuzawa trusts an imposter of Jie Mei, JSDF goes ahead with the preparation for destroying the stone pillar in the depth of ocean where Ushio's mother Sumako has kept Hakumen imprisoned with her shamanic power.

episodes.title: Mother
episodes.plot: Finally, Ushio and Sumako meet again with the help of the staff on a submersible vessel. Mother's love makes him happy that give a chance to Hakumen to escape from the stone pillar.

episodes.title: The Beast Spear Destroyed
episodes.plot: Earthquakes occur all over Japan. People are filled with great fear that give Hakumen more power. Ushio confronts Hakumen with a strong hatred, although Sumako has stopped him.

episodes.title: Tora
episodes.plot: The prophecy comes true, the Beast Spear breaks into pieces during the fierce battle. Ushio sees someone's past in ancient times as a dream while he is sinking in the ocean.

episodes.title: Hope
episodes.plot: Kirio tells Sumako and Mayuko that he found out something about the past of Tora and other Azafuses. Meanwhile, small pieces of the Beast Spear save Ushio from the bottom of ocean, and then, they kill Hiyou which has possessed billions of minds.

episodes.title: To the Promised Night
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora confront Hakumen again. Hyou makes a duel with Guren to revenge his wife and daughter.

episodes.title: The Ultimate Insult
episodes.plot: Mayuko pulls her soul out of her body to support Tora. The allied forces of human and yôkai restore the bonds among themselves to beat Hakumen.

episodes.title: The End
episodes.plot: There are three survivors in mystical barrier, because Hakumen strikes back with poison. The last battle of Ushio and Tora versus Hakumen enters in the final phase.

episodes.title: The Fate of Ushio and Tora
episodes.plot: Hakumen crushes its eyes itself to overcome the fear of the Beast Spear. Tora wants to save all the people even if it has to sacrifice itself, and tells the strategy to Ushio.

episodes.title: The Fate That Brings Ushio and Tora Together
episodes.plot: A middle school boy Ushio Aotsuki lives with his father Shigure. Sigure works as the chief priest of a Buddhist temple. One day, Ushio finds a spear with a yôkai which looks like a big tiger, at the basement of his storehouse. The yôkai wants him to pull the spear out of its body.

episodes.title: Rock Eater
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora started watching for a chance to be after their life each other. Meanwhile Ushio's schoolmates were attacked by a warrior statue in his school.

episodes.title: The Demon That Dwells in the Painting
episodes.plot: Ushio gets to know his favorite painter's daughter Reiko. He wants to draw her portrait, but he finds some people died suddenly after they got involved with her.

episodes.title: Tora Goes to the City
episodes.plot: Ushio has a doubt that Tora is evil man-eater when he heard a news that many staff were slaughtered at the construction site. He blames Tora too much without the evidence that's why Tora leaves Ushio's house.

episodes.title: Exorcist Hyou
episodes.plot: A male exorcist Hyou have been searching for a yôkai which like a big tiger for a long while, because of the revenge for his family's death. He gets a information about Tora on the news in Hong Kong, and then he heads out to Japan.

episodes.title: The Sea of the Ayakashi
episodes.plot: Ushio and his friends go to the sea for the summer vacation. Meanwhile a yôkai asks Tora for help.

episodes.title: Legend
episodes.plot: Ushio heard about his mother from Umi-zatô, so he demands an explanation from Sigure. Meanwhile, some Buddhist monks strongly disapprove of Ushio as the owner of the Beast Spear, they attack him and Tora.

episodes.title: He Is in the Sky
episodes.plot: Ushio with Tora takes a trip to Hokkaido to make a search for his mother's information. He gets to know a middle school girl Yû, and a fighter pilot in JSDF Atsuzawa, inside of the airplane. But the plane was targeted by a flying yôkai Fusuma.

episodes.title: Mad Wind
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora arrived in Sendai-city, however, Ushio finds he has lost his wallet. Then, Yôkai siblings Raishin and Kagari ask them for help.

episodes.title: The House Where the Kappa Lives
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora get to know a girl Saya at Touno. Her family has forced her to take care of Omamori-sama, because Omamori-sama is also known as Zashiki-Warashi and it's said "The clan will fall from power if Zashiki-Warashi leaves their house".

episodes.title: Mirror of a Single Strike
episodes.plot: Ushio predicts that Asako will scream with fear by the reflection in the water when he visits Raishin and Kagari. Meanwhile, Mayuko invites Asako to her house.

episodes.title: The Road to the Touno Youkai Battle: Part One
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora get separated because they were under assault from many yôkais during the journey. Ushio comes across a friendly yôkai Kappa that heals him, and gives a information about his ultimate enemy Hakumen.

episodes.title: The Road to the Touno Youkai Battle: Part Two
episodes.plot: Ushio has run from many yôkais in a foggy forest by himself. And then, he hears a voice that tell him to get inside a mansion where appeared at the front of him suddenly.

episodes.title: Hiyou Pursuit: Successor
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora arrive together in Hokkaido. Hakumen's minions Hiyou pursue them. Meanwhile, the four successors to the Beast Spear that Kôhamei sect had chosen run after Ushio to put to the test whether he is right for the Beast Spear or not.

episodes.title: The Crossroads of the Pursuit: Successor
episodes.plot: Ushio and Tora got on a public bus which is out of control due to Hiyou. One of successors Nagare gives assistance to them to save the passengers.

episodes.title: Transformation
episodes.plot: One of successors Satoru, his body and soul are undermined by Hiyou. Ushio and Tora try to save him for his sister Jun.

episodes.title: To Kamuikotan
episodes.plot: Ushio saved Satoru at great cost. Ushio turns into a beast, and it heads straight to Kamuikotan.

episodes.title: Revival: And Finally...
episodes.plot: Five girls Ushio has saved before, his father Sigure with Kôhamei sect, his cooperators and Tora were gathered in Kamuikotan by the spirit guardian Jie Mei. They try to turn Ushio back to normal. However, deciding that is a prime opportunity to exterminate its all enemies, Hakumen sends a lot of Hiyou to launch a raid against them.

episodes.title: The Demon That Turns Back Time
episodes.plot: Ushio comes to his senses. With the help of Jie Mei and a yôkai Tokisaka, he and Tora go back in time when the Beast Spear someone had wrought.

episodes.title: The Demon Returns
episodes.plot: Ushio faced off against Hakumen for the first time without the Beast Spear in ancient city of China, but he didn't know what to do with great fear. Tora was also overwhelmed by Hakumen's massive power. It was all they could do to save a blacksmith Giryou and his sister Jie Mei.

episodes.title: The Fourth: Kirio
episodes.plot: The crisis was over for the moment, Ushio goes back to Tokyo with Tora. He gets to know a mysterious boy Kirio, the meeting brings him back to his extraordinary life again.

episodes.title: Great Summoning~Destruction of the Beast Spear
episodes.plot: Ushio tortures himself by deep grief. Tora encourages him with its style to make greater efforts. Kirio incites some monks in Kôhamei sect to try to take the Beast Spear from Ushio with violence.

episodes.title: Eternal Solitude
episodes.plot: Ushio, Tora, Nagare, and Hinowa went to a mansion where Kirio was born. There are a lot of traps in the house, Nagare and Hinowa are caught the trap to defend Ushio. And then, Ushio and Tora find a person who manipulated Kirio from behind.

episodes.title: The Fools Gather at the Banquet
episodes.plot: Mayuko is about to go to a banquet when Tora visits Mayuko. Tora feels a sign of yôkai from her invitation letter that's why Tora follows her.

episodes.title: H.A.M.M.R~The H.A.M.M.R Institute
episodes.plot: Ushio, Tora, and Asako are abducted from the HAMMR Institute. Asako finds that this organization has kept many yôkais in captivity for their study.

episodes.title: TATARI BREAKER
episodes.plot: Hakumen's tissue starts acting violently in HAMMR's laboratory. It includes a friendly yôkai Baldeners, then Ushio and Tora, how will they fight against that?
